show_name: Dog Soldier: Shadows of the Past (OAV)
other_title: ドッグソルジャー "SHADOWS OF THE PAST" (Japanese)
plot: When an American scientist carrying a cure for the AIDS virus is kidnapped by an arms merchant, John Kyosuke is forced back from retirement. He accepts the challenge to regain pocession of the anti-serum. He finds out that some of the people he is after are closely related, which gives his conquest a whole new meaning.
